title: $1000 Move in Special! Available 1x1 Home in a Pet-Friendly Community!
posting_body: ['Get $1000 off your first month rent when you lease with in 48 hours of your tour at Clayton Gardens.', 'Clayton Gardens', 'Address:', '4220 Clayton Rd Concord, CA 94521', 'Medium 1 Bed 1 Bath  1 \xa0bed / 1 bath / 600 Sq.', 'Ft / $2,314 - $2,567', '* Unit 220 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 214 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 108 - Available', 'Now', 'Live with beauty and serenity', 'During your spare time, come relax by the balcony of this one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment now available at Clayton Gardens!', 'Walk through the community and you’ll notice the comfortable lifestyle that this home offers through features such as air conditioning and ceiling fans.', 'Arranging your groceries and other various belongings in the kitchen is more manageable using the large, built-in pantry.', 'Moreover, cleanup is now simpler with the outfitted dishwasher.', 'Finally, you can watch the latest episodes of your favorite shows via the available cable television connections.', 'Make sure you use the community facilities such as the fitness center where you can improve your overall wellness.', 'In addition, the laundry room is available to help make your stay hassle free.', 'With these perks, it’ll be easy for you to pick up the phone and call to book a tour!', 'Property Amenities:', '*', 'FitnessCenter', '* ClubHouse', '* Carports', '* Cable', '* Air conditioning - central air', '* Laundry', '* Controlled building access', 'Lease Terms:', '12 month lease', 'Parking:', 'Type', '- Other', 'Please contact our office for parking details.', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cat, Dog s are allowed.', 'We accept 2 pets per apartment home.', 'Pet fees range from $55 to $80 per pet.', 'There is a weight limit of 50 lbs.', 'Please contact our leasing office for pet policies and breed restrictions.', 'Office Hours:', 'Tuesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Friday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Saturday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Management Company:', 'GK MANAGEMENT CO INC**', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'x136', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
